techmeme.title: The EU sends TikTok an urgent request for information on Russia's role in Romanian election turmoil, a day after ordering it to retain all election-related data (Kelvin Chan/Associated Press)
Apple's John Giannandrea, Craig Federighi, and Greg Joswiak on the company's work on transformer-based AI models after GPT-3, building Apple Intelligence, more (Steven Levy/Wired)
Sources: with its own modem in the pipeline, Apple is investigating bringing cellular connectivity to the Mac and headsets like Vision Pro for the first time (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
A US teen faces backlash for making ~$50K via a "soft rug pull" on Pump.Fun, which made $250M+ in less than a year and is struggling to protect users from scams (Joel Khalili/Wired)
SpaceX got a Pentagon contract in August to expand Ukraine's access to Starshield, an encrypted signal over Starlink that's more difficult to hack into or jam (Anthony Capaccio/Bloomberg)
